author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great!
review:
This set was the other one I got in that great thrift store bargain that I mentioned in 1877.  A big soccer field, this, and 1877... This and 1877 were new in their boxes!!!  All for a splinded bargain!!!

This set is really fun to build, It has some cool old parts.  The design is really good, and the sunroof is neat.  Over all, a cool set.

P.s.  Is one fig's head supposed to be solid stud, and the other's hollow???
